text:
Champions League
Liverpool - Genk streaming: where to see the match?
Liverpool receives at Anfield Genk, as part of the fourth day of the Champions League. A meeting broadcast live on French television by RMC Sport 7 live, this Tuesday, November 5, from 21 hours, but also to follow live streaming on Android, Iphone, iPad, PC or Mac.
05 Nov 2019, 05:30 by Charlie Creteur



Still leader in the Premier League standings, Liverpool has been full of confidence against Aston Villa during the 11th day. The Reds won at Villa Park 1-2. Aston Villa opened the scoring through Trezeguet in the first period (21st, 1-0) before Robertson's equalizer (87th, 1-1) then the goal of Sadio Man√©'s victory in overtime (90th). +4, 1-2). They face for the second time tonight Genk, on the occasion of the fourth day of the Champions League Group E.







The classification of group E




J√ºrgen Klopp + 13 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport


Naples - 7 pts
Liverpool - 6 pts
RB Salzburg - 3 pts
Racing Genk - 1 pt




The calendar of group E




Sadio Man√© + 13 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

1st day - September 17th

RB Salzburg 6-2 Racing Genk
Naples 2-0 Liverpool

2nd day - October 2nd

Liverpool 4-3 RB Salzburg
Racing Genk 0-0 Naples

3rd day - 23rd of October

9 pm: RB Salzburg 2-3 Naples
9 pm: Racing Genk 1-4 Liverpool

4th day - November 5th

9 pm: Liverpool - Racing Genk
9 pm: Naples - RB Salzburg

5th day - 27th November

9 pm: Liverpool - Naples
21 hours: Racing Genk - RB Salzburg

6th day - December 10th

18:55 Naples - Racing Genk
18h55: RB Salzburg - Liverpool




This meeting between Liverpool and Genk is broadcast this Tuesday, November 5 on RMC Sport 7 live from 21:00 French time. A channel accessible by subscription to a limited number of audiovisual actors. Mainly SFR and Canal +. As a result, you can not access it via your Internet operator for example, there is an alternative solution: the 100% digital offer of RMC Sport (or OTT). A subscription available at a price of 9 euros per month for mobile or fixed subscribers of SFR, 19 euros per month with commitment / 25 euros per month without commitment for non-subscribers.
